item.title: How I Scanned and Organized 10,000 Photos using VBA and Excel
item.description: I started a new job in 2020. Little did I know that this would spend me spiraling into learning many programming languages. On my first day one of my co-workers asked me what extent my Excel knowledge was. I told him some of the projects that I had worked on before and he said that it was a good starting point better than some interns in the past. He followed that up by saying that they did some macros but nothing crazy.
